label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_029
content:
## 2024-09-16 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 126
- Active: 112
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 50
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 14

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 29
- Mid Dose: 32
- High Dose: 33
- Placebo: 32

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 48.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 21.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 68.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 101.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 71.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 17.3
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 76.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 27.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 114.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 180.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 124.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 33.8
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 102.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 43.7
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 163.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 235.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 178.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 36.0
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 7.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 11.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 28.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) Mean: 20.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10e6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 5.3

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 58.9
- Erythema Percentage: 23.1
- Swelling Percentage: 16.4
- Induration Percentage: 3.6
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 22.2

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 6.3
- Fatigue Percentage: 39.6
- Myalgia Percentage: 19.0
- Headache Percentage: 20.2
- Chills Percentage: 10.2

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.3
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 28.9
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.4
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 53.7
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 5.1
- Platelets (K) Mean: 227
- Platelets (K) SD: 42
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.3
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.9

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2903, Description: fever, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2980, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2908, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2931, Description: chills, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2964, Description: headache, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- Site 02 monitoring visit, 3 minor findings
- Vaccine lot VX-588 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range

### Notes
- Week 29: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 126 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
